creator: Topicus Onderwijs B.V.
descriptionHtml:
Parro supports the superteam parent & teacher! Parro contributes to parental involvement and enhances the communication between parent and teacher in a secure environment.

Using Parro, both parent and teacher have all important, and fun, information within reach, collecting it all tidely within one app. Keeping each other up to date by sharing photos and experiences through Parro is made easy using a combination of class announcements and personal messages. Furthermore, Parro helps you organising your activities, gathering volunteers, and creating a schedule for <<>>. Parents can maintain the overall picture using the Parro calendar and use it to immediately enlist for activities.

We teach Parro new tricks on a regular basis! For an up-to-date list of all of Parro’s features take a look at our website www.parro.com

Is your school interested in starting with Parro? The direct integration with ParnasSys allows you to get started right away. For more information visit www.parro.com/starten
descriptionShort: Stay informed on the most important future and past events of a pupil

Parro supports the superteam parent & teacher! Parro contributes to parental involvement and enhances the communication between parent and teacher in a secure environment.

Using Parro, both parent and teacher have all important, and fun, information within reach, collecting it all tidely within one app. Keeping each other up to date by sharing photos and experiences through Parro is made easy using a combination of class announcements and personal messages. Furthermore, Parro helps you organising your activities, gathering volunteers, and creating a schedule for <<>>. Parents can maintain the overall picture using the Parro calendar and use it to immediately enlist for activities.

We teach Parro new tricks on a regular basis! For an up-to-date list of all of Parro’s features take a look at our website www.parro.com

Is your school interested in starting with Parro? The direct integration with ParnasSys allows you to get started right away. For more information visit www.parro.com/starten
descriptionShort: Stay informed on the most important future and past events of a pupil

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Absenties. Als de school dit geactiveerd heeft, kunnen ouders nu via Parro absenties doorgeven

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Actueel inzicht in absenties, medische- en contactinformatie van leerlingen;
- Gebruik Parro nóg veiliger met een pincode, vingerafdruk en/of gezichtsherkenning;
- Meld een leerling eenvoudig absent [leerkracht] en zie dit direct terug in ParnasSys;
- Zie welke ouders/verzorgers bij welke leerling horen en/of wie de leerkrachten zijn van je kind;
- Kies direct een gesprekstype bij het aanmaken van gesprekken;
- Synchroniseer de Parro-agenda met je eigen iOS, Google, Outlook en Android agenda.

Parro supports the superteam parent & teacher! Parro contributes to parental involvement and enhances the communication between parent and teacher in a secure environment.

Using Parro, both parent and teacher have all important, and fun, information within reach, collecting it all tidely within one app. Keeping each other up to date by sharing photos and experiences through Parro is made easy using a combination of class announcements and personal messages. Furthermore, Parro helps you organising your activities, gathering volunteers, and creating a schedule for <<>>. Parents can maintain the overall picture using the Parro calendar and use it to immediately enlist for activities.

We teach Parro new tricks on a regular basis! For an up-to-date list of all of Parro’s features take a look at our website www.parro.com

Is your school interested in starting with Parro? The direct integration with ParnasSys allows you to get started right away. For more information visit www.parro.com/starten
descriptionShort: Stay informed on the most important future and past events of a pupil

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Actueel inzicht in absenties, medische- en contactinformatie van leerlingen;
- Gebruik Parro nóg veiliger met een pincode, vingerafdruk en/of gezichtsherkenning;
- Meld een leerling eenvoudig absent [leerkracht] en zie dit direct terug in ParnasSys;
- Zie welke ouders/verzorgers bij welke leerling horen en/of wie de leerkrachten zijn van je kind;
- Kies direct een gesprekstype bij het aanmaken van gesprekken;
- Synchroniseer de Parro-agenda met je eigen iOS, Google, Outlook en Android agenda.

Using Parro, both parent and teacher have all important, and fun, information within reach, collecting it all tidely within one app. Keeping each other up to date by sharing photos and experiences through Parro is made easy using a combination of class announcements and personal messages. Furthermore, Parro helps you organising your activities, gathering volunteers, and creating a schedule for <<>>. Parents can maintain the overall picture using the Parro calendar and use it to immediately enlist for activities.

We teach Parro new tricks on a regular basis! For an up-to-date list of all of Parro’s features take a look at our website www.parro.com

Is your school interested in starting with Parro? The direct integration with ParnasSys allows you to get started right away. For more information visit www.parro.com/starten
